A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her progress, various sorts of turmoil in her D.I.Y life lead to an abortive entry in the race, then a genuine start, but with an unknown and untested horse and an unacknowledged horse substitute.

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form a posse to destroy the animal, and things seem to be just fine. Well, until they find that one cat has been turned into an unstoppable killing machine, and is killing the townspeople one at a time.
